data.message:
Wrote this cuz I was bored. Love you bro

Liquid lyricism
*fuck Eminem 

Try not to un fathom my non-understandable mental and intelligence channels 

I can't be damned

I really simply meant to humbly ask you to try to maybe happen to challenge you

But id rather unravel you with lyrical damage proof channels of impossible tests of the gods of the new math of truth 

and you can never undo
What was unspun for one man to do

What has been undone and smashed and slammed to show how shit goes when you're busy dancing in these toe to toes
I'm busy passing these po po's
With slo mo mental emotional cop car detector sonar; its not on my dash board

it's only my telekinetic automobile pool ball anti-pig-ego- polar

I'm so focused with clarity
I'm learning money v boundaries 
I don't deny that I'm hood rich
I just don't need no clowns get be down with me
No fucking beat box is drowning me
The bass playing so loud is the only sound which is found in me
I never needed no crown 
I only needed a Scott storch radio channel and a bunch of new crowns to beat

😎🤓
If you're bored too then write one back, I bet I win ✨🖕✨
✌
